<p><a href="http://www.papascott.de/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IKEA-logo.jpg"><img src="http://www.papascott.de/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/IKEA-logo-300x190.jpg" alt="IKEA-logo" width="300" height="190" class="alignright size-medium wp-image-17117" /></a>Should I be worried when, we have a free weekend alone without our son, that my wife's best suggestion for an activity together is a trip to Ikea?</p>
<p>Should I be even more worried when, after I express my doubts about going to Ikea, the next day she changes her mind and says I don't need to come along after all?</p>
